content.rendered:
Bridge Careers Travel Agencies

5416 S Yale, Suite 205, Tulsa, OK 74135
(918) 622-2588

If you need help finding a qualified candidate for a current or future job opening, and are looking to partner with a company that focuses on treating clients with honesty and integrity, we would love to speak with you. Or if you need help finding your next position, we work with top-notch employers who are searching for qualified employees that fit not only the job description but also the company culture. We would love to partner with you in your job search and be your resource for finding a new position with a reputable company in the Tulsa area.
